title: pothavillaye lyrics mudinja ivana pudi
stanzas:
naal muzhukka unnai
kangal thindra pinnum
unthan sorkal reithu
naan nanaitha pinnum

innum innum pakkam vanthum
kittathatta oddi kondum
moochil theeyum
patri kondum...mm

theaneerai naam urinjum
maalai pothathe
kai korthu poga intha
saalai pothathe

en enana vinkalam naan sollave
kaipeasi minkalam pothathadi
un azhakai paruga en kangal pothathadi
en nilaiyai ezhutha vaanangal pothathadi

nera mullai pin izhuthum
vaaram ettu naal koduthum
sutrum bhoomiyai thaduthathea

thonnooru aandugal nee keatkiroy
genmangal aayiram pothathada
nam kanavai sethukka
pearandam pothathada
ivvulagil irukkum
deivangal pothathada

kuddi kuddi kobam kondu
kaddi muddi mothi kondu
thiddi thiddi theertha pinnum...mm

shswasha paiyil unthan
vaasam pooddi vaithum
nencha yeaddil yeangum
un pearai theeddi vaithum

paadal theerntha pona pinnum
mounam kooda theerntha pinnum
kodi muththam vaitha pinnum..mm
